## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description      | Type     | Default     |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | ---------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `cardDescription` | `card-description` | Card description | `string` | `undefined` |
| `cardTitle`       | `card-title`       | Card title       | `string` | `undefined` |
| `icon`            | `icon`             | Card icon        | `string` | `undefined` |
| `img`             | `img`              | Card img         | `string` | `undefined` |
| `link`            | `link`             | Card link        | `string` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event              | Description                     | Type               |
| ------------------ | ------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `cardGridSelected` | Triggers when card is selected. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
